title: Ṣuwwānet eth-Thanīya
description: Settlement area 2.8km north of the center of modern Jericho with archaeological remains from the Early Roman period, Iron Age, and Late Chalcolithic. The site was at least partially destroyed by agriculture and construction of a road in the area.

properties.description: Approximate imagery location based on Google Earth representing Ṣuwwānet eth Thanīya after Landes 1975.
properties.title: Approximate imagery location of Ṣuwwānet eth Thanīya
